heading: daimler-chrysler?
subheading: shares in the carmaking giants were trading higher this morning on news that they are deep in merger talks. daimler-benz sources said a meeting had been called for this evening so the firm's supervisory board can discuss the mega-merger plans, and chrysler's directors reportedly were to consider it at a scheduled board session today. at some us$35 billion, a deal between the two would be the largest industrial merger in history.
author: wired staff
